skills.name: Preemptive Strike
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times. Each attack has a 25% chance to increase the enemy's chance of dealing a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Briefing
skills.description: Removes all harmful effects on an ally target and fills up the ally's Attack Bar.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skills.name: Lock Down
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times with each attack decreasing the target's Attack Bar by 25%. Additionally, this attack will increase the Defense of all allies for 3 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.
